CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISNULL( Divestiture_Site__r.Notice_of_Decom_NOD__c ), ISNULL( Must_Deconstruct_by_Leasing__c )),NULL, IF(Divestiture_Site__r.Notice_of_Decom_NOD__c <= Must_Deconstruct_by_Leasing__c ,Divestiture_Site__r.Notice_of_Decom_NOD__c, Must_Deconstruct_by_Leasing__c ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the lesser of the Notice of Decom date or the Must Deconstruct by (Leasing)
CustomField.label: Must Deconstruct by
